metadata.entity_name: Use solder containing colophony, zinc chloride, ethanolamine, or ammonium chloride flux

title: Use solder containing colophony, zinc chloride, ethanolamine, or ammonium chloride flux

job_task_name.value: Use solder containing colophony, zinc chloride, ethanolamine, or ammonium chloride flux

cross_references.text: use solder containing colophony, zinc chloride, ethanolamine, or ammonium chloride flux
cross_references.name: Use solder containing colophony, zinc chloride, ethanolamine, or ammonium chloride flux

comments.value: Occupational asthma has been reported in 1) electronics workers soldering with colophony flux; 2) workers manufacturing rosin core solder; 3) metal jointers using zinc chloride and ammonium chloride flux; and, 4) electronic assemblers using flux containing 95% polyether alcohol + 5% polypropylene glycol. Asthma also confirmed in a solderer using adipic acid and N-(2-Hydroxyethyl)ethylenediamine; [Malo]

diseases.value: Diseases associated with this job task: Asthma, occupational
